name: Raihan Rahman
review: Bought as a gift, was very well received! It would be incredibly though, if there were keys to change the layout to qwertz or whatever one needs. Thanks anyways, its a great product that feels very well crafted.

name: Mehruz Saif
review: This is my first mechanical keyboard and I absolutely love it! I found YouTube reviews of it and it sounds amazing even without modding. great design as well.

name: Sadique Kakku
review: It is excellent! High quality material, and a wonderful typing experience. The backlight could be transparent through the letters... but that's a minor issue. Really, this keyboard is perfect!

name: Manaul Islam
review: I really like the theme of the astronaut and space. Typing is really enjoyable and I really like the switches I chose for this keyboard. Overall a really good keyboard!

name: Vodro Zarif
review: Very nice customer support replies fast and very informative. Keyboard is very good, only negative I could find was that it is very hard to open the board.

name: Navid Al Kakku
review: Amazing Keyboard! I took it to work and showed some of my friends and they are determined to buy one! I got the gold pink switches and they are so smooth! Dang this thing is amazing.
